He is an easy grader and I just loved the class!

comments: I took Professor Laufenbergs class my first semester at Waubonsee and found it to be much easier than English was in High School. He does 12 Journals about topics he assigns that are due once every week, Only 5 Essays including a self reflection essay and research paper. This teacher wants his students to succeed highly recommend taking him.

stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS
comments: Coming from high school, I was nervous but Laufenberg was really open to how papers went. There were a total of 4 essays, a resume/cover letter, and a self-reflection at the end. Between each paper we were assigned short journals due for every class. Attendance is mandatory but he can be lenient with turning in things late. Would take again!

comments: Professor Laufenberg has been my first english professor here at Waubonsee. Now ENG101 is your standard english class, so naturally the class can get a bit... dry. However, Laufenberg definitely has a sense of humor, and makes the class laugh all the time. Also, clear guidelines for what you need to do for each essay are always given. Great teacher

comments: Todd is very passionate about what he teaches, it shows in his lectures. He has a great sense of humor (it\'s a little weird but he\'s funny). There is about 5 papers in his class, he gives chances to look over them and correct them one on one. Not test heavy or quiz heavy, it is mostly writing. He gives good resources that make it easy to write.
